body.name: 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera [24/7 Recording] with 20W Solar Panel, 20000mAh Battery,360° Pan Tilt,Spotlight Color Night Vision,2 Way Talk,PIR Motion Detect,No Wifi,IP66,SOLIOM SL800-4G US Version
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 39 mins
features: 【24/7 Always Recording to Micro SD Card】The SL800 4G no Wifi security camera can only keep recording for 24/7 after you installed a Micro SD card(32G preloaded). And the outdoor security camera has built in total 20000mAh batteries and dual solar panels in 20W to keep self-circulating power supply. The SL800 Supports up to 128GB SD card. Note: Installing a Micro SD card is a must to keep the camera always recording, the Cloud Storage can only record motion triggered videos.

【FOR PLACES NO WI FI & ELECTRICAL POWER】SOLIOM SL800 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera can work anywhere nationwide with 3G/4G LTE covered in the US. The 4g camera can work independently regardless of a sudden power off by getting non-stop solar power supply from solar panel. The no wifi security camera is ideal for outdoor places that is off-grid or no Wi-Fi, such as backyard,garden,campers, trailers,RV, construction site, workplace, warehouse, farms, and ranch etc.

【Pan Tilt Wide Angle & Color Night Vision】The 4G LTE Security Camera Outdoor is build in a broader lens of FOV105°. Also have pan&tilt function that can have the view of 355°horizontally and 95° vertically. You can remotely control the pan-tilt feature via the Soliom+ App, and always keep a watchful eye on your family member or your property.SOLIOM cellular camera equipped with 4 upgraded spotlights for full color night vision and HD video,you can see clearer night vision up to 32ft in the dark

【Instant Motion Detection Alert & Push Notification】The security cameras wireless outdoor use a highly sensitive PIR motion sensor with accurate software pixel analysis technology to double control and reduce false alarms, the 4G wireless camera comes with a 120° detecting angle captures all human movements steadily. Alert notificatios will be sent to your phone immediately, you can also set the alarm to warn off the intruders.

【Cellular Data & Storage】Soliom 24 hour recording 4G cellular camera comes with an USA nano-SIM card prepaid 300 MB free data for a trial. Cellular data plans for the prepaid SIM card from $14.90/month to $199.9/year per camera, or you can use your added line of your phone SIM card.Data plan from AT&T or T-Mobile or Verizon are recommended.Soliom also provide event triggers 7 days cloud storage for free trial.
body.description: Steps to set up the camera: 1. Insert the Nano-SIM (Included) into the SIM card slot of the camera. 2. Download Soliom+ APP. 3. Turn on the camera and wait for the led status to turn blue (be careful to distinguish the SIM card slot and SD card slot) 4. Use Soliom+ APP to scan the QR code on the body of the camera 5. Follow the user manual to finish the initial setup

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why do we need a 24 Hour recording 4G LTE cellular solar powered security camera? You will not miss any moment! The 4G cellular solar-powered security cameras in the market only record when motion is detectedThe Soliom SL800-4G supports 24/7 continuous recording providing you with 100% complete video records for the full dayNever worry about missing any important moment imagine that the motion detection is delayed or failed.You can check any video recorded and playback it, instead of the short and intermittent motion-detected videosWith the 20W solar panel ,20000mAh rechargeable batteries and the SIM card wireless connection, your camera will always keep recording when there's a blackout of electricity

Let the Soliom 24/7 Hours Continuous Recording Cellular Security Camera to Keep an Eye on Your Property How is the Soliom SL800-4G 24/7 recording video stored ? The whole 24/7 recording videos are stored in a Micro SD card, this LTE cellular security camera supports memory cards from 8G to 128G. (32G SD card preloaded). While inserting a Micro sd card is a must to have the 24 hours recording functionYou can also subscribe to the Cloud service, it's very economical to just record motion-detected videosWhen the camera battery power level drops below 30%, the security camera will switch itself to motion detection mode to record only triggered motions automatically to save power Information for your reference: 128GB Micro SD card can support 41 days cycle of 24hrs recording64GB Micro SD card can support 20 days cycle of 24hrs recording32GB Micro SD card can support 10 days cycle of 24hrs recording (Preloaded)8GB Micro SD card can support 2.7 days cycle of 24hrs recording256G is not supported

The Soliom 24 hours solar powered security camera can work anywhere with cell tower, no need electric outlet or Wi-Fi (in the US region) Important Notes: 1. Only supports Android or iOS. Does not support computers, Macs, NVR systems, Blue Iris, or any third-party software. 2. Must be installed 8-10ft from the ground for a better view. 3. Only supports connecting to the network via SIM card, not Wi-Fi. 4. SD card was preloaded from the order of March 4th. 2023. 5. Only compatible with the "Soliom+" App.

Diverse Recording Plan You can schedule continuous video recording for certain hours. When you set the certain hours recording plan, the security camera can only record triggered videos during the rest of the hours for the day. Or just let it keep as default for 24 hours recording day by day. Share the Access with Your Family The outdoor camera can be shared with up to 10 family members at the same time, which is convenient to share with your family members for happy moments or to take care of kids, elders, or pets anywhere. Note: The shared users have to register an account in Soliom+ APP first. Color Night Vision and Wide Viewing Angle, Clear Image of 1080P The Soliom 4G LTE security camera has 4 very bright LED lights to let the solar camera has night vision up to 23ft/7m which allows you to capture colorful videos even in low-light conditions. Pan 355° wide viewing angle Tilt 90° 3X digital zoom can cover a wider field of vision.

2-Way Talk and Live View The Soliom security camera outdoor has a built-in speaker and microphone system allowing clear and real-time 2-way communication with visitors. You can also warn off intruders remotely from Soliom+ APP. IP66 Weather-Resistant With IP66 great weatherproof performance, Soliom outdoor security camera can prevent water from seeping into the camera and withstand the temperature range from -4F°to 140°F, which is able to withstand tough weather like wind, rain, and snow. Cheap Monthly Cellular Data Plan Soliom 24/7 solar security camera comes with a nano-SIM card prepaid 300 MB free data for a trial. Cellular data plans for the prepaid SIM card from USD14.90/month to USD199.9/year per camera, or you can use your added line of your phone SIM card.Data plan from AT&T or T-Mobile are recommended.

What's in the package: SL800-4G camera x1 (with 3 Batteries built in)20W dual solar panel x1SIM card x1 (Prepaid 300M cellular data) &32G SD cardx1USB cable x110ft Solar panel charging cable x1User Manual & Quick Guide x1Solar panel installation bracket x1Camera bracket x1Position Paper x1Fittings Bag x1 Steps to set up the camera: 1. Insert the Nano-SIM (Included) into the SIM card slot of the camera. 2. Download Soliom+ APP. 3. Turn on the camera and wait for the led status to turn blue (be careful to distinguish the SIM card slot and SD card slot) 4. Use Soliom+ APP to scan the QR code on the body of the camera 5. Follow the user manual to finish the initial setup

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can't stop buying Soliom cameras
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is my 5th Soliom camera. They have proven themselves to be durable and useful. I needed one more to see the other side of my house and inside my carport.The box comes with a camera, (smaller than the S600) a mount for it, solar panel, extension cord for the solar panel, screws and anchors, mounting templates that are stickers, and a manual.The extension cord is a must if you want a camera where the sun doesn't shine. The templates I have never used, but it's nice that they are stickers so you don't have to tape it to your surface and risk removing paint. I always just use the included screws and my battery powered impact driver to drive the screws right in through the holes in the mounts. No pre-drilling necessary for small screws like those into wooden surfaces.Make sure to charge the camera fully before you install it. They don't ship fully charged because it's not good for the batteries when not in use to be fully charged.I use a 128GB SD card for video storage so I don't have to pay for cloud storage. It's nice to have the option, unlike the popular brands that have no SD card option so you are forced into paying for cloud storage if you want to view anything from the past.The camera is easy to pair to your 2.4ghz network and the app is intuitive and responsive.The video quality is awesome for cameras in this price range. You can toggle between SD and HD quality if capacity is a concern. The camera has the option of turning on a bright light at night and recording color video when motion is detected. The other option is to record in night vision black and white. During the day it's color.The two way audio works well for speaking with people. The sound is coming out of the camera and coming from the camera in the app.The solar panels do a wonderful job of charging the cameras. I had one that would die after a few minutes and customer service was responsive. I unfortunately had to charge it again for some reason. After that one occurrence these stay charged and haven't run out of battery even during the gloomy Michigan winters.The only thing I wish they would work on is a way to integrate it into my Google home displays like a nest. That road block is the fault of Google I would assume though. They want you to buy their subscription based camera systems.Overall these are great cameras! I know I have another blind spot to cover in the back I will be buying another one for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Soliom S600 is a great value! Just buy it.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Soliom S600 needing a reliable WiFi connected security camera for our remote cabin. Installation was straight-forward and took little time. After connecting, I was pleased to find that the solar panel is very effective in keeping the camera fully charged. The pan and tilt feature is great. The picture quality on SD or HD is terrific. All in all, a great value for the money. Product quality and performance is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well-featured & reliable cameras for the price
reviews.reviewText: EDIT: Removing one star for the “Please log in again” glitch. I should not have to log in *every single time* I use the app.Original review continues below:I have purchased several of the Soliom cameras for on & around my house. My property is ~17,000 sq ft, so as a result some of the cameras are 100 ft from the wifi extenders or more, and they still work quite reliably. Ymmv, however if you have a strong 2.4g signal you should be ok.I have a mix of the S90 units and the S600 units. I prefer the newer model as it has a slightly wider field of vision (even while stationary), the option for night vision or flood light, and of course the pan & tilt feature. The S600 also seems to adapt to lighting conditions upon user wakeup better than the S90.Soliom recommends that you charge the unit fully before installation, however when installing one of these I did not notice that the device was only at 50% until after it was mounted. Still, in only partial shade and with daily use, it charged to full using only the sun in less than a week. The company also makes users update to the new Soliom+ version of the app, which seems annoying since 1) they ask for an email registration and 2) older devices (such as the early S90s) require a firmware update. However, please note that the app does not require a valid email to work, and the firmware update is pretty painless.The lack of 5g wifi support was initially frustrating, however 2.4g does travel farther, so this makes sense. The setup workaround (rather than turning off your 5g for installation) is to simply move out of 5g range while pairing the camera. Once installed, the cameras find the 2.4g network fine, with no interference while the 5g signal is broadcasting.The only problems I have had with these cameras:- After heavy rain this season, one of the cameras stopped working. Upon inspection, I noticed that the silicone cap protecting the external usb cable had come off. After a couple hours of charging, the unit (which had also previously lost one of the antennas to a tree branch) seems to be working again, so maybe the rain had shorted something temporarily. Time will tell.- One of the units shipped without the o-ring between the solar panel and the camera. The device is mounted under an eave, so I’m not too concerned.- There is some delay between the motion sensing detecting activity and being able to pull up the feed, however if you have cloud or SD recording, the activity seems to be captured on the footage. I have been alerted twice to people on my property (and several times to wildlife).- SD card in the device records reliably, and video can be downloaded to your device (at least with the S600/ app v1.1.16/ iPhone), however saved video sometimes does not start on “play”. Workaround for problematic playback (or for the S90) is to use screen recording.Tldr...Pros:- Reliable- Self-charging- Setup is not difficult- Fairly good (1080p) quality- Good field of view- Good feature upgrade from previous models- Two-way audioCons:- Some lag when activating video feed- Mic quality (receiving) could be better- Recording/downloading options could be better- Zoom is digital, not optical- Documentation & app could use more review (earlier versions of app had some misspellings)- App only supports 8 cameras- Newer Soliom+ app does not support QR code “sharing” of cameras between family members (this feature was very convenient)- No 5g supportOverall, a good value. Have not found anything better in the wireless category at this price point.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Security Camera / Gran cámara de seguridad
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was pleased with the simplicity of the installation and set up. It had an added feature I hadn't counted on as it lights up when someone approaches at night. I plan and buying 2 more cameras.*********************************************************************************************Quedé satisfecho con la simplicidad de la instalación y configuración. Tenía una característica adicional con la que no había contado: se ilumina cuando alguien se acerca por la noche. Planeo y compro 2 cámaras más.

reviews.reviewText: Excellent Value, sharp clear clips, excellent night vison capability, would recommend this product

reviews.reviewTitle: Good picture during day and night.
reviews.reviewText: Works satisfactory for keeping an eye on the house. Found it difficult to get a good signal strength at the at the front of the house.
Se desconecta frecuentemente y debo apagarla y prenderla para que vuelva a funcionar y es muy molesto porque no estoy fisicamente en donde la tengo instalada y paso dias sin que me de servicio
Me gusta mucho, funciona bien y fácil de instalar. Sin embargo, se está desconectando últimamente y tengo que ingresar cada vez con usuario y contraseña.
